job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We're looking for a Lead AI Engineer with a strong background in generative AI models and an interest in Privacy Enhancing Technologies (PET). The ideal candidate will explore the intersection of generative AI and MPC, developing new techniques and methodologies that allow for secure, distributed AI computations. You will be working with the Nillion Product team and report to Nillion's AI Product Lead., * You will design & execute a technical AI roadmap towards bridging the gap between AI and confidential computing, in close collaboration with our AI and cryptography team
     * You will work closely with our cryptography team, getting up to speed with the technical nuances & implementing AI models accordingly
     * You will adapt AI model architectures to work in a performant way under a confidential computing paradigm and technically implement these architectures in our AI toolkit
     * You will have regular touchpoints with AI developers on the Nillion network and integrate their feedback in our AI roadmap
     * You will work closely with our DevRel team and actively contribute to creating easy-to-use AI tools and suitable AI development workflows
job_details.full_text:
Lead AI Engineer (Remote, Europe)

We're looking for a Lead AI Engineer with a strong background in generative AI models and an interest in Privacy Enhancing Technologies (PET). The ideal candidate will explore the intersection of generative AI and MPC, developing new techniques and methodologies that allow for secure, distributed AI computations. You will be working with the Nillion Product team and report to Nillion's AI Product Lead., * You will design & execute a technical AI roadmap towards bridging the gap between AI and confidential computing, in close collaboration with our AI and cryptography team
     * You will work closely with our cryptography team, getting up to speed with the technical nuances & implementing AI models accordingly
     * You will adapt AI model architectures to work in a performant way under a confidential computing paradigm and technically implement these architectures in our AI toolkit
     * You will have regular touchpoints with AI developers on the Nillion network and integrate their feedback in our AI roadmap
     * You will work closely with our DevRel team and actively contribute to creating easy-to-use AI tools and suitable AI development workflows

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with generative AI models, adapting AI model architectures, implementing AI models, and developing AI tools and workflows. This aligns directly with the core responsibilities and evidence profile of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in areas like modeling generative techniques and building applications around them. While there's a mention of confidential computing and cryptography, the primary focus remains on the application and adaptation of AI models, rather than traditional ML prediction or data engineering.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'adapt AI model architectures to work in a performant way under a confidential computing paradigm and technically implement these architectures in our AI toolkit' directly relates to modifying and implementing AI models, which is a core aspect of modeling.
job_tasks.phrase: adapt AI model architectures to work in a performant way under a confidential computing paradigm and technically implement these architectures in our AI toolkit

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'implementing AI models accordingly' indicates the practical application and integration of AI models, a key part of the modeling task.

The phrase 'design & execute a technical AI roadmap towards bridging the gap between AI and confidential computing' implies the development and strategic planning of AI-related technical solutions, which falls under software development in a broader sense of building AI systems.
job_tasks.phrase: design & execute a technical AI roadmap towards bridging the gap between AI and confidential computing

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'contribute to creating easy-to-use AI tools and suitable AI development workflows' points to the development of tools and processes for AI, which is a software development activity.
job_tasks.phrase: contribute to creating easy-to-use AI tools and suitable AI development workflows

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'explore the intersection of generative AI and MPC, developing new techniques and methodologies' suggests understanding the strategic direction and exploring novel applications, which requires business and domain understanding.
job_tasks.phrase: explore the intersection of generative AI and MPC, developing new techniques and methodologies

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'technical AI roadmap' implies a strategic plan aligned with business or product goals, fitting the business understanding category.
